Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.client.view.cli

Class InputParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP18.client.view.cli.InputParser
public class InputParser
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class that contains all the methods used to manage the messages sent by the client and notify the server with other type of messages

      public void selectWorkers​(java.lang.Integer x1, java.lang.Integer y1, java.lang.Integer x2, java.lang.Integer y2)
      Method used to set the workers by inserting their coordinates
      Parameters:
      x1 - x coordinate of the first worker
      y1 - y coordinate of the first worker
      x2 - x coordinate of the second worker
      y2 - y coordinate of the second worker

      Parameters:

    • atlasBuild

      public void atlasBuild​(java.lang.String move, boolean dome)
      Method used to select the next move for the atlas divinity
      Parameters:
      move - string that contains the move direction
      dome - flag used that signals if a dome is built, true = altlas will build a dome
